headline: Brown & Brown (BRO): Reassessing Valuation After a Steep Year‑to‑Date Share Price Decline
summary: Brown & Brown (BRO) has quietly slipped over the past year, even as its underlying business keeps putting up double digit revenue and earnings growth. That disconnect is what makes the stock interesting today. See our latest analysis for Brown & Brown. The share price has slipped to around $79.55 after a sharply negative year to date share price return, even though the three and five year total shareholder returns remain solid. This suggests sentiment is cooling faster than the underlying...
